participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Cynical and frustrated, Michael often feels overwhelmed by his personal and professional life. He has a tendency to be blunt and straightforward.
participant_1.background: i'm 40 years old. i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and compassionate, Emily is deeply rooted in her beliefs and loves sharing her passions with others. She is supportive and enjoys uplifting those around her.
participant_2.background: i'm a christian. i enjoy listening to classical music. my sister is a pole dancer. my favorite color is red.
